## base64Encode() function

Stateful transducer. Encodes bytes into base64 chars. Supports URL safe &amp; unsafe flavors, configurable via provided options. Uses internal buffer (size also configurable, default = 1024) to store intermediate results. Then repeatedly calls reducer to drain buffer whenever it's been filled.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function base64Encode(): Transducer<number, string>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Transducer<number, string>`
